title: Add a featured image to the Major Projects (Our Projects) page

requirements.text: Add a prominent featured image section to the Major Projects page (route "/projects"), positioned between the page title/intro block and the projects grid, using the same responsive styling pattern used on Services and Major Clients pages (full width, max-w-5xl, centered, rounded corners, shadow, object-cover).
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting "/projects" shows a featured image between the heading/intro text and the list of ProjectCard items.
The image uses consistent styling with other page hero images (rounded-lg, shadow-lg, object-cover, centered with max width).
The image has an English alt text that describes the visual content.
The rest of the Major Projects content and layout (project list/grid) remains intact and renders correctly.

requirements.text: Add the new Major Projects featured image as a static asset under the public assets path so it can be referenced by the Major Projects page via an absolute path (e.g., "/assets/generated/..."), without routing the image through the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists in the frontend public assets (under the generated assets folder) matching the filename specified in Image Requirements.
MajorProjectsPage references the image via a public path (e.g., "/assets/generated/<filename>") and the image loads in the browser in production builds.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change the existing list of projects or ProjectCard content/fields.
Do not add new routes or navigation items; only update the existing Major Projects page content.
Do not add lightbox/modal behavior to the featured image (only a static display).

required: Wide hero photo of an active electrical worksite with electricians in PPE, visible switchgear/cable trays, industrial/commercial setting, warm neutral tones, realistic photography style (major-projects-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg)
